mapper.insert: insert into t_type_info (dtype, sql_type, col_type, sql_type_code, create_table_type) values (#{dtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sqlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

sql_type,
